DOC.brief_summary: This study will evaluate the efficacy, safety, and tolerability of sofosbuvir /velpatasvir (SOF/VEL) fixed-dose combination (FDC) in participants with chronic hepatitis C virus (HCV) who have received a liver transplant.
DOC.brief_title: Sofosbuvir/Velpatasvir Fixed Dose Combination in Participants With Chronic Hepatitis C Virus Infection Who Have Received a Liver Transplant
